warnings: WARNINGS If symptoms do not improve or are accompanied by fever, consult a doctor. Keep out of the reach of children. In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a poison control center right away. If pregnant or breastfeeding, ask a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of the reach of children. If pregnant or breastfeeding, ask a healthcare professional before use.
dosage_administration: DIRECTIONS Place drops under tongue 30 minutes before/after meals. Adults and children 12 years and over: Take 10 drops up to 3 times per day for up to 6 weeks. For immediate onset of symptoms, take 10 to 15 drops every 15 minutes up to 3 hours. For less severe symptoms, take 10-15 drops hourly up to 8 hours. Consult a physician for use in children under 12 years of age.
indications: INDICATIONS For the temporary relief of runny nose, nasal congestion, headache, or mild facial or ear pain due to a cold, hay fever, or other upper respiratory allergies.*
